summary: UAT fixes testing completed successfully. All 3 UAT fixes verified: Back to Dashboard navigation with ?from=admin query param, Copy Report button in chat workspace, and Stripe Billing Portal upgrade configuration. All 97 unit tests continue to pass.
passed_tests: All 97 unit tests pass (no regressions from UAT fixes)
Basic API endpoints accessible (billing portal returns 401 not 404)
UAT Fix A: Back to Dashboard button routes to /?from=admin correctly
UAT Fix A: ?from=admin query parameter skips welcome screen as expected
UAT Fix B: Copy Report button exists in chat input area with correct data-testid
UAT Fix B: Copy Report button is disabled when no report exists (correct behavior)
UAT Fix B: Copy Report button copies only report content, not chat messages (code verified)
UAT Fix C: Stripe Billing Portal configured for upgrades with STRIPE_PORTAL_CONFIGURATION_ID support
Language selector label correctly shows 'Input language' (not just 'Input')
Support modal Copy Account Details button exists and functions correctly
Admin members page has seat counter in X / Y format
Admin members page has upgrade seats button when limit reached
Navigation flow works correctly: welcome → login → app with ?from=admin bypass
